meanings.definition: To write, print, or engrave on a scroll or parchment.
meanings.sent1: She carefully inscrolls her name on the ancient scroll.
meanings.sent2: The scribe inscrolls the important decree on the royal parchment.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elf inscrolls silly doodles on the wizard's scroll.
meanings.sent4: Her memories inscroll themselves on the pages of her mind like an endless scroll.
meanings.sent5: The artist inscrolls intricate patterns on the delicate parchment with precision.

meanings.definition: A written or printed document on a scroll or parchment.
meanings.sent1: The inscrolls of the ancient civilization reveal their history.
meanings.sent2: He unrolled the inscrolls to find the prophecy written inside.
meanings.sent3: The inscrolls in the library whispered secrets to those who dared to read them.
meanings.sent4: The inscrolls of time unfold slowly, revealing the stories of generations.
meanings.sent5: The inscrolls in the museum showcase the artistry of the past.
